instructionsForfind2:
You will have 5 seconds to memorize the images
Touch a box to discover it and
look at the image that hides.
Tap another box to find out too.
If the images match, they will remain face up, otherwise they will be covered again.
Find all the pairs.
instructionsForfind3:
You will have 10 seconds to memorize the images If the images match, they will remain face up, otherwise they will be covered again.If the 3 match, they will stay face up, if not, they will tie again.
Find all the pairs.
instructionsFormirror2: It is the same as finding 2 but now for each pair of images there is another pair with the same image but reflected horizontally in a mirror.Find all the pairs.
instructionsFormirror3: It is the same as finding 3 but now for each trio of images there is another trio with the same image but reflected horizontally in a mirror.Find all the pairs.
howToPlayTutoiral:
Touch a box to uncover it and see the see the image it hides.

Touch another box to uncover it as well.

If the images match, they will stay face up, otherwise they will be covered again. 

Find all the pairs.
openNet: Please enable the internet to get hints

Privacy Policy
